map.item:
In this task, an array of squares will be presented to the left and right of a central fixation point. For each block of trials, you will be given a target color ([COLOR_ONE] or [COLOR_TWO]) to attend to. Your task is to respond whether the square matching the target color contains a gap on the top or on the bottom.
If the gap is on the TOP of the target square, press [TOP_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
If the gap is on the BOTTOM of the target square, press [BOTTOM_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
Please respond as quickly and accurately as possible.
Press either button to see the target for this block.

Your target color for this block is: [TARGET_COLOR]
As a reminder, if the gap is on the TOP of the target square, press [TOP_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
If the gap is on the BOTTOM of the target square, press [BOTTOM_BUTTON] with your dominant hand.
Press either button to begin.

Take a rest!

Press either button to begin.
